title: If I'm getting sad when I'm listening music, should I not listen anymore? - Quora

response.answer_text: I’m also sad when I listen to some songs like Sia’s songs,I think If you get sad because song is sad itself its not bad cuz maybe you can get happy as well if song is happy. Music is amazing thing,music doesn’t have nor religion,nation or race,nor language. You shouldn’t stop listening to music cuz music can really shape your day and make your life more colorful and amazing. My mood actually depends on music I listened to before.

If you’re sad when you’re listening to music, either use it as a cathartic release, feel the sadness, and try to figure out why you’re feeling sad. Have a good cry perhaps and release some toxins from your body. Or find some music which makes you feel happier.
